text: Phu sraththa thanghlay! Kar prahar khatkr hı tay tam nı krni thi mi phu thuk kha tay nan di thuk kahnd kæ phwk cea læw khux chay xisra tx chay xisra læa thas tx thas læa hying tx hying læw phu dı thi sing hnung cak phinxng khxng khea thuk xphay hı kæ khea læw k hı ptibati pi tam nan doy chxb læa hı chara kæ khea doy di nan khux kar phxnprn cak phracea khxng phwk cea læa khux kar xendu metta dwy læw phu dı lameid hlangcak nan khea k ca di rab kar lngthosʹ xan cebsæb
